Key Match Events: Zach Edey fouled out after just 15 minutes of action in his NBA debut.
The Grizzlies won 126-124 against the Jazz.
Ja Morant returned to the game and scored 22 points with 10 assists.
Pre-Game Insights: Zach Edey was the overwhelming favorite to win Rookie of the Year.
Edey was a two-time player of the year at Purdue.
Edey had an impressive preseason performance with a 23-point, nine-rebound game against the Pacers.
Post-Match Reflections: Ja Morant expressed excitement about being back on the floor and mentioned the trust and belief his teammates have in him.
Desmond Bane commented on Edey's solid performance and potential for growth.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Jay Huff, Edey's backup, contributed 13 points and five rebounds.
The game marked Ja Morant's return after a season that started with a 25-game suspension and ended with a shoulder injury.
